lead_paragraph: Everton manager Roberto Martinez said he accepts the criticism being aimed his way after a series of dreadful results left a team packed full of promising talents languishing 12th in the Premier League.

headline.print_headline: Martinez Accepts Criticism for Everton's Slump
headline.main: Martinez Accepts Criticism for Everton's Slump
